message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $15000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $12500. It's still a great deal considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand that $9000 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $10500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the value you're getting. What do you think?
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
